attributes.action: That GCSE students should get the equations on there GCSE physics exam
attributes.additional_details: I believe that this should be a law because it is not right that students should not be given the equations, because if they forget equations then they will unfairly miss out on very important marks, thus dragging their grade down. Students won’t get the grade that they deserve and I believe it is injust as in the real world.
attributes.background: That they should make sure that all kids that do their GCSE physics exam should be able to get the equations needed for that exam.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Ensure GCSE students have equation sheets for maths and science exams
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650047
